title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; install from PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps Ollama REST calls for easier model management and bulk pulls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with first-class streaming support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting Kotlin, Scala and Android; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-registry
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions used by Ollama; submit community fine-tunes via PR.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot written in Go that streams Ollama responses into thread replies.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit app template for chatting with Ollama models, including file upload and conversation history.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that integrates Ollama into no-code workflows for local LLM tasks.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (Reddit showcase)
summary: Developer shares open-source RAG chatbot combining Ollama, LangChain and Chroma with Gradio UI.
